name: celebrant
content:
celebrant noun [C]
(AT CEREMONY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a priest who leads a religious ceremony, or a person who leads a ceremony such as a marriage or a funeral

celebrant noun [C]
(AT PARTY)
US a person who attends a celebration : They helped clear up after all the celebrants had gone.
